nodes.text: Chamber of Cleansing was the name of a cave located in the Gormak Lands on Voss. It was used as a place to enter the Spirit World by the dream-walkers such as the Gormak Hadrik, one of the few non-Voss dream-walkers. Around 3640 BBY Sith Lord Kallig visited the Chamber to contact Hadrik in the Spirit World.
The Chamber of Cleansing appears as a location in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Voss.
